project_descr: The objective of this project is to promote electricity generation through gasification of waste agricultural residues (biomass) to supply both the main grid and isolated mini-grids.

outputs.output_descr: The objective of this project is to promote electricity generation through gasification of waste agricultural residues (biomass) to supply both the main grid and isolated mini-grids.

project_title: promotion de la production durable de biomasse électricité au bénin.
